SELECT pdp.*, sup.name customerName, p.name productName, p.typeId, P.spec, pt.name typeName FROM (SELECT pd.id, pd.productId, pd.number, pd.price, pd.totalMoney, pd.notOutNumber, p.code, p.customerId, p.ctime, p.cuserId, p.status, p.companyId, p.initDate, u.type FROM sell_detail pd LEFT JOIN sell p ON pd.sellId = p.id LEFT JOIN SYSTEM_USER u ON p.cuserId = u.id) pdp LEFT JOIN customer sup ON pdp.customerId = sup.id LEFT JOIN product p ON pdp.productId = p.id LEFT JOIN product_type pt ON p.typeId = pt.idWHERE dd.companyId = #{companyId} ORDER BY ctime DESC
limit #{start},#{size}

SELECT count(*) count FROM (SELECT team.*, pro.name productName, pro.typeId, prod.genericSpec, prod.specialSpec FROM ( SELECT pdp.*, sup.name customerName, sku.productId, sku.ownSpec FROM (SELECT pd.id, pd.skuId, pd.number, pd.price, pd.totalMoney, pd.notOutNumber, p.code, p.customerId, p.ctime, p.cuserId, p.status, p.companyId, p.initDate FROM sell_detail pd LEFT JOIN sell p ON pd.sellId = p.id ) pdp LEFT JOIN customer sup ON pdp.customerId = sup.id LEFT JOIN product_sku sku ON pdp.skuId = sku.id ) team LEFT JOIN product pro ON team.productId = pro.id LEFT JOIN product_detail prod ON team.productId = prod.productId) dd LEFT JOIN (SELECT pt1.id, pt1.name, pt2.name parentName FROM product_type pt1 LEFT JOIN product_type pt2 ON pt2.id = pt1.parentId) pt ON dd.typeId = pt.id WHERE dd.companyId = #{companyId}
